import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardActions, CardMedia, Button, Typography, CardContent} from '@material-ui/core'; import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz'; import moment from 'moment'; import useStyles from './styles'; const Post = ({post, setCurrentId }) => { const classes=useStyles(); return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag)=> `#${tag} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ) } export default Post
